lines.text: [Sarah kisses Michael]
You do that again and I'm gonna have to fuck you kinda hard.

I was a funny little man. Needed the fan's help just to make it out of bed every morning. But luckily I was blessed with the best fans in the league. For the rest of the day I needed God's help. But luckily I was blessed with the best God in the league, too.
I don't want to fuck you. I just want to make you come.
You're Sarah Easton, supermodel. I see you everywhere.
You're Michael Shiver, cab driver. I see you nowhere.
Why did you come here?
I came by accident.
The only accident is you're leaving, but don't worry 'coz it's never going to happen again.
I could not hang on to who I was in the world that came with what I did. If and when I learn how to do that, I will write again.
Robin, come on. You encourage him. I would think that you'd be appalled.
Why? Why?
I don't know. I mean, he's got to be breaking some kind of feminist ethic or something.
Nope.
A spiritual ethic?
Mm-mn.
A social ethic.
No.
Definitely a gay ethic.
Sally, he sex-talk-fucked a supermodel into coming without touching her, in his kitchen. If anything he's up for an award.
